data.text: @Independent THats ridiculous!!! I have the right and the freedom to tell my nephews not to play wiht girls toys or wear dresses and my nieces to wear boys clothes —- the people who complain about it are destroying child’s identity and confusing them for no reason —

@Independent Are you for real hammy me ol son!!, take a look in the  mirror....ie your own petite earrings, and some of the clothes you wear...😂.
Maybe your a little on the gay side yourself..
@Independent #Stick to your principles. There's Nothing to apologize for.

@Independent Aye, Boys Don't Wear Princess Dresses, and I Say That UNAPOLOGETICALLY!!! 

WHY IS IT RIGHT FOR HOMOSEXUALS TO FORCE THEIR LIFESTYLE ON THE WORLD!?!?!?

@Independent Society has gone bonkers these days. People who want their boys to wear princesses dress, go on and let them wear it. It’s yours and theirs freedom of choice. People have also got the freedom to say boys don’t wear princesses dress without being vilified.It’s simple and plain! 🙄

@Independent He Hamilton (not the musical) wears massive diamond earrings & has the audacity to critique a kid who was most likely trying on priest costumes - Las Vegas showgirl outfits all the rage for altar theatrical rituals. Protesting too much!
